Class BattleShip

  • java.lang.Object
    • BattleShip

  • public class BattleShip
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simulates battleShip game with 2 players Player 1 is a human Player 2 can be either human or AI
    Since:
    3/26/2018

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BattleShip()
      Constructor simply makes 2 new player classes

    • Method Detail

      • accurateShot

        public int accurateShot(int x,
                        int y,
                        int playerNum)
        This is the accurate shot, it hits the exact coordinates given It updates both player's boards and opponet's board according to shot status
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate for shot
        y - y coordinate for shot
        playerNum - player number (1 or 2)
        Returns:
        Shot hit status | 1: hit 0: no hit -1: Unknown shot(This never happens anyway...)

      • lossyShot

        public int lossyShot(int x,
                     int y,
                     int playerNum)
        This is the lossy shot, it can hit either the exact coordinate or other 8 neighborhoods
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate given
        y - y coordinate given
        playerNum - player number (1 or 2)
        Returns:
        hit status | 1: hit - 0: no hit

      • shot

        public int shot(int x,
                int y,
                int playerNum,
                int shotStyle)
        Calls either accurate shot or lossy shot
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the shot
        y - y coordinate of the shot
        playerNum - player number(1 or 2)
        shotStyle - (1: accurate shot | 2: lossy shot)
        Returns:
        hit status| 1: hit | 0: no hit | -1: Unknown(It'll never happen anyway...)

      • shotAvailablity

        public boolean shotAvailablity(int x,
                               int y,
                               int playerNum)
        Shot availablity status
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the chosen coordinates
        y - y coordinate of the chosen coordinates
        playerNum - player number (1 or 2)
        Returns:
        shot availablity status: true: available | false: not available

      • hitsNeededForWin

        public int hitsNeededForWin(int playerNum)
        total hits needed to win = total length of opponet's ships
        Parameters:
        playerNum - player number(1 or 2)
        Returns:
        total successful shots needed for win = total length of opponet's ships

      • checkWin

        public boolean checkWin(int playerNum,
                        int playerHits)
        if total successful hits = total hits needed for win : Player won the game!
        Parameters:
        playerNum - player 1 or player 2
        playerHits - Successful shots of the player
        Returns:
        true: Player won the game | false: player hasn't won the game yet

      • randomShipLength

        public int randomShipLength()
        Generate a random length for AI ships
        Returns:
        random length for a ship of AI

        public int randomCoordinates()
        Generate a random coordinate for AI's shot (used both for x and y)
